requiredEquipmentExplanation: The video titled "20 Minute Full Body Workout (No Equipment)" and its metadata strongly indicate that no equipment is required for this workout. Both the title and numerous tags, such as "no equipment full body workout," "bodyweight workout," and "home workout without equipment," emphasize that the workout is designed to be equipment-free. Furthermore, the description corroborates this by highlighting that the workout is a "no equipment and no repeats 20 minute full body workout." Although the workout details mention using "just a mat," it is not a necessity for performing bodyweight exercises but rather a comfort accessory. Therefore, the confidence is very high that no equipment is strictly needed, aligning with the overall theme and description provided.
